subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Atlantic 10 tournament brought St. Louis Coach Jim Crews to Brooklyn, where his son, Todd, is an associate pastor and the leader of the young adult program at the Brooklyn Tabernacle.
snippet: The Atlantic 10 tournament brought St. Louis Coach Jim Crews to Brooklyn, where his son, Todd, is an associate pastor and the leader of the young adult program at the Brooklyn Tabernacle.
